name: Platformeristan
description:
Platformeristan is a Open World, Top Down Simulation Game.

Your objective is explore the Platformeristan Universe, find the unique mobs, and bring them to your farm!

(Its basically a push game)

There are totally 5 different mobs in game. But remember this game in Early Access.

Mobs (Contains Spoilers):

Plantoid: A basic tree mob. Hasn't grown yet. When grows up, he cant be able to move and contiunes his life as a tree.

Rockoid: A rock mob. He carrys coal ores on his skin. Dont try to collect them.

They are too slow and heavy. So its hard to carry but they are chilling.

Pointoid: An ash mob. He formed from ashes in the quarry. Best little friends of Rockoids. They are too small and taking their names from the point(actually eye) of their skin. Carrotid: An mutated carrot mob. They are lucky for mutating because they are no longer can be eaten(i think).   Potatoid: An mutated potato mob. They are lucky for mutating because they are no longer can be eaten(i think).  

Use the boxes saying "Push" as a door. I was too lazy to make a new door sprite.

You can only grab barrels and doors for now. 

To grab, just get near of the objects.

To carry mobs, just push them.

You can use your wand to help you carrying mobs.

All musics used in this game belongs to Concerned Ape.

Music names:

067 - Journey Of The Prairie King - Overworld

068 - Journey Of The Prairie King - The Outlaw

069 - Journey Of The Prairie King - Final Boss & Ending

All the sprites made by SWURQIE Pie (Me).

-This is my first project, so you can give me advices in comments.-
